data: This powerplan is used for the initiation of a Massive Transfusion.  For ongoing treatment, please use the specific blood product powerplans
Massive transfusion is anticipating needing 3 units or more of RBCs within the first hour
Inform blood bank that the Massive Transfusion Protocol has been initiated.  Provide the blood bank with the patient's name, birth date and Medical Record Number
Initial Resuscitation also includes  - Aggressive rewarming to keep temperature GREATER than 35 degrees C  - Consider calcium gluconate 1 g for every 4 units of RBCs
Reverse anticoagulant, if applicable. Refer to Anticoagulation Reversal powerplan
1 g, IV, once, drug form: inj, first dose: STAT
Tranexamic acid both bolus and infusion should be started within 3 hours of traumatic bleeding
1,000 mg, IV, once, drug form: inj, first dose: STAT
